name: David Wheeler
biography: David E. Wheeler is President of Portland-based Kineticode and Co-Founder of PostgreSQL Experts. David also maintainers and leads development of Bricolage, a content management and publishing system powered by Perl and PostgreSQL. For his next trick, he may or may not build a Python or Lisp or BASIC-powered Web application, but whatever it is, it will likely be built on PostgreSQL. Unless it’s a blog, in which case he’ll just use SQLite.
